title: Smart Asset Genesis Document
description: Immutable genesis document for a Smart Asset. The asset_id is the sha256 digest of the JCS-canonicalized genesis JSON, computed with any top-level asset_id field omitted (derived field).

stack_spec_version.description: Stack specification version used to interpret this document.

asset_id.description: Optional explicit asset id (informational). If present, SHOULD equal sha256(JCS(genesis-without-asset_id)).

created_at.description: Creation time of the genesis document.

asset_class.description: Semantic category (not necessarily tokenized): e.g., legal_entity, security, property, building, ip, account, credential.

creator.description: DID (or other identifier) of the creator / asset authority.

home_harbor_id.description: Optional preferred home harbor / jurisdiction id (zone id).

extensions.description: Extension point for domain-specific fields while keeping the canonical top-level strict.
